title: So how exactly do I level up on the Boards?
body:
Ok, so I'm pretty noobish when it comes to the general mechanics of how things work, especially when it comes to the boards here.
I wanted to post on Concepts & Creations, but it said I needed to be at least level 7, and I don't know how to level up.
The only board I'm able to post on is here so hopefully somebody can help me out on this issue, as I'm dying to start posting more soon.
Thanks you guys, and have a good one.
     -HD

replies.body:
Hey HDBreakd0wn,

I performed an audit on your account and I believe I updated your level on boards. Are you still experiencing this issue?
Not anymore! In fact, I just posted to the Concepts & Creations board! Thank you so much!
I am having this issue as well.
Are you still experiencing this issue? It looks like your profile displays Level 30 now!

The account level should automatically update whenever someone post on the boards, making it an interesting bug since they're effectively solving it themselves by asking for help :)
At least that's what it is like over on EU ^_^

######Hugs from the Volunteers (ɔ◔‿◔)ɔ ♥
yea I was having the same issue and I solved by asking for help. interesting{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I'll see your late response and raise you and even later one!

Yes, the issues seems to have been resolved. There is another little issue where I will log into the boards and somehow it will log me into to some weird "null" account where I can't upvote/reply/post and I have to log out and log back in a few times to get it to work. But it happens intermittently and only every once in a while so it's not a huge deal, just odd.
Replying to this comment in the hope that I'll find the same update everyone else is experiencing.
At the time of my posting this, it says I too am still under-leveled despite my placing in ranked in seasons 5 and 6 xD
I also have the same problem as Breakdown. Thanks. Also, which boards should I go to for information on why the ranked queue takes me 7 minutes or more, even when using fill as my position.
